SCTX:
begin MehraMiloScript

short travelDone
short travelNow
short noLore

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( travelDone == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( GetCurrentAiPackage == 1 )
	;if travel is the current package, set travelNow and continue\
	set travelNow to 1
	SetHello 0

	if ( GetAIPackageDone == 1 )
		set travelDone to 1
		set travelNow to 0
		AiWander 128 6 0 40 30 20 0 0 0 0 0 0
		SetHello 30
	 endif

	if ( GetPos Y > 1730 )
		;failsafe
		set travelDone to 1
		set travelNow to 0
		AiWander 128 6 0 40 30 20 0 0 0 0 0 0			
		SetHello 30
	endif

else
	;if travel is NOT the current package, make sure travelNow is zero
	set travelNow to 0
endif

End
